DOC.brief_title: Effect Monthly High Dose Vitamin D3 Bariatric Surgery Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Sun exposure supplement use questionnaire : A registered dietitian ask subject information sun exposure , vitamin , medication , supplement usage blood sample take . Lab analysis include serum hydroxy vitamin D level pre 3 month postoperative . Descriptive statistic include mean standard deviation calculate study variable . A paired sample t-test use determine significant difference mean value pre post vitamin D supplementation . An independent sample t-test use assess significant difference group ( control vs. vitamin D supplement ) mean . A p-value < 0.05 consider statistically significant . Statistical analysis do use SPSS Version 21 ( SPSS , Chicago , III , USA ) .
DOC.criteria: morbidly obese eligible bariatric surgery 18 60 year age elevate serum vitamin D calcium pregnant lactating woman
